alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Seminole, central Lake and southeastern Volusia Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Osteen to near DeBary to near Lisbon. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Sanford, DeLand, New Smyrna Beach and Edgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
